body_html: I did re-install cuda 9.0 after I uninstalled 9.2 and then reinstalled tf v.1.8 . the validation on terminal of tf was successful but again it was running on cpu and not gpu!! . I am absolutely puzzled why i cannot get tf gpu working tried every thing under the sun -very frustrating
